medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain and fecal urgency
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Onset of diffuse abdominal pain and fecal urgency with malaise; pain gradually became sharper and localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Noticed pain when standing from a seated position; denies nausea or vomiting; normal appetite; normal bowel movement today; sensation of bloating; denies fevers/chills.
medical_history.family_history: Mother passed away from metastatic breast cancer; Father alive, has obesity and gout.
